mentions.context: PlasPredict also listed all contigs 164 corresponding to complete plasmids available in the NCBI database (Figure 1).
Proteins were blasted with blastp 2.9.0+ (E-value = 0.001) against the 209 EggNOG 4.0 database to determine their cluster of orthologous groups (COG) functional 210 categories (Powell et al., 2014).
plasmid contigs were predicted by PlasPredict and 162 annotated by PlasAnnot, the assembly taxonomy was provided by PlasTaxo, and the resistance 163 gene abundance matrix was provided by PlasAbund.

The cleaned reads were assembled with Megahit v1.0.5 (D. Li et al., 2015), then 160 processed with the bioinformatic workflow (Hilpert et al., 2020) composed of several scripts 161 (https://github.com/meb-team/PlasSuite):
An overview of the plasmids was produced with DNAPlotter v1.11 208 (Carver et al., 2009).
plasmid contigs were predicted by PlasPredict and 162 annotated by PlasAnnot, the assembly taxonomy was provided by PlasTaxo, and the resistance 163 gene abundance matrix was provided by PlasAbund.

The main software options are described with the software in brackets: Megahit 170 (default), Prodigal (-c -m -p meta), hmmer (-E 1e-5), minimap2 (-x asm5), Blast (E-value 1e-171 6), PlasFlow (--thres 0.7 with default models), prokka (--metagenome --hmms --rawproduct --172 force "RESFAM profiles" in the plasmid database).

The main software options are described with the software in brackets: Megahit 170 (default), Prodigal (-c -m -p meta), hmmer (-E 1e-5), minimap2 (-x asm5), Blast (E-value 1e-171 6), PlasFlow (--thres 0.7 with default models), prokka (--metagenome --hmms --rawproduct --172 force "RESFAM profiles" in the plasmid database).

All the linear plasmid contigs matching the 182 reference sequence were then ordered against the suitable reference plasmid by Mauve v 183 snapshot_2015-02-13 (Darling et al., 2010).

The main software options are described with the software in brackets: Megahit 170 (default), Prodigal (-c -m -p meta), hmmer (-E 1e-5), minimap2 (-x asm5), Blast (E-value 1e-171 6), PlasFlow (--thres 0.7 with default models), prokka (--metagenome --hmms --rawproduct --172 force "RESFAM profiles" in the plasmid database).
